original_text: The Lord will make the pestilence stick to you until he has consumed you off the land that you are entering to take possession of it.
korean_text: 여호와께서 네 몸에 염병이 들게 하사 네가 들어가 차지할 땅에서 마침내 너를 멸하실 것이며

sentences.original_text: The Lord will make the pestilence stick to you
sentences.korean_translation: 주께서는 전염병이 너에게 붙어있게 하실 것이다.

sentences.original_text: until he has consumed you off the land
that you are entering to take possession of it
